dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The medal will be awarded to war veterans, military personnel, workers, and employees who became disabled due to injuries or illnesses sustained at the front or in the rear. It will also be given to military personnel without disabilities who served during the war, spouses and widows of fallen soldiers, as well as former underage prisoners of concentration camps and ghettos.
